q: said that after losing out to Page and co-founder Sergey Brin over the company's China policy a year ago,`` Eric Schmidt lost some energy and focus.`` Eric Schmidt was also criticized for allowing Google be overtaken by Facebook, for the company's increasingly frequent privacy scandals and its increasing internal bureaucracy. Together with the co- founders, he decided to step aside.In announcing the move Thursday, Eric Schmidt said that the company no longer needed his`` adult supervision and that Page, 38, was ready to run the world's leading internet company.`` We have been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time,

( Microsoft CRM 2011 Release Candidate Available, Launch Date Set The move is an example of Steve Ballmer 's commitment last year that the company is`` all in'' on cloud computing. This is the first time we've made a release in the cloud before we have done so in the server version, and I think that really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud, Steve Ballmer said in a statement. In fact, Microsoft's Dynamics CRM Online service is based on Microsoft's Dynamics CRM 2011 package, which is set for its own launch on Thursday.

Google will take its eye off the Google Apps enterprise movement with Page in charge, given his penchant for prioritizing search engines, YouTube, and the Chrome browser and OS over enterprise software and services. If Google lets Google Apps languish, even a little bit, it only benefits Microsoft, says Roger Kay . Since Thursday's announcement of Eric Schmidt 's departure as CEO, Page has not publicly addressed how Google's strategy may change when he takes the helm. Google's One-Trick Pony Perception

Retired general Colin Powell , secretary of state under President Bush , said Sunday defence spending shouldn't be spared the hatchet during such difficult economic times. I don't think the defence budget should be made sacrosanct, he said. The Barack Obama administration has proposed cutting US$ 78 billion from the military budget in the next five years.
